Key Match Events: Zach Edey scored 14 points, grabbed 8 rebounds, and made 1 three-pointer in his first game off the bench for the Grizzlies, contributing to their 128-104 win over the Wizards
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zach Edey had a heated exchange with Jonas Valanciunas during the game
Others: Zach Edey's minutes were limited due to Brandon Clarke starting in his place
